Art. 4.42. 
Assignment entailing acceptance 
A gift, sale or assignment made by one of the co-heirs of his successive rights, either to a stranger or to all or some of his co-heirs, entails acceptance of the succession on his part.   The same applies to: 
1¡ a renunciation, even gratuitous, made by one of the heirs in favour of one or more of his coheirs; 
2¡ a renunciation made even in favour of all his coheirs indiscriminately, where he receives the price of his renunciation.
